Reviews.Title: Great Simple Phone!!
Reviews.Author: Zach FL "zANAZ"
Reviews.Content: Another great Sony product. beatiful screen and lots of features including a Radio..very good battery life..fits nicely in your hand..calls are clear.. would recomend!!

Reviews.Title: No is much good!!
Reviews.Author: Ledif Alberto Morales del Castillo
Reviews.Content: The phone is no big deal, really expected more from the heart grean line. sound quality is terrible, the only thing we truly have a very attractive design. brought not bring NAIT applications, such as the code memo photo and video DJ. not recommend it. is fast but does not meet my demands to have more by the thought.

ProductInfo.Features: QUADBAND, 3G, EDGE, MICROSD CARD SLOT, BLUETOOTH
